definition: To reduce the length, duration, or time of something, often used in the context of making something shorter or more concise. It is commonly employed when referring to shortening a period, distance, or waiting time.

examples.english: I want to reduce my working hours.

examples.german: Kannst du den Text bitte verkürzen?
examples.english: Can you please shorten the text?

examples.german: Durch den Umweg konnten wir die Strecke verkürzen.
examples.english: By taking the detour, we were able to shorten the distance.

examples.german: Die Wartezeit wurde verkürzt, indem mehr Personal eingesetzt wurde.
examples.english: The waiting time was reduced by deploying more staff.
